item.title: Power Tips - February 2021
item.description: In this issue: Column separation during pivoting library(magrittr) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Consider a tibble in a wide form: ds <- tibble::tribble( ~ person_id, ~height_cm_1, ~heigh_cm_2, ~weight_kg_1, ~weight_kg_2, 1, 160, 170, 67, 78, 2, 155, 168, 56, 61 ) ds ## # A tibble: 2 x 5 ## person_id height_cm_1 heigh_cm_2 weight_kg_1 weight_kg_2 ## <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 1 160 170 67 78 ## 2 2 155 168 56 61 Many graphing and modeling tasks will require ds to be transformed into a tidy form:
